titleStmt.title: Oriens ab occidente: or, A dawning in the vvest· As it was delivered in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons, at Westminster; upon their day of thanksgiving, for severall victories in the west, &c. By John Bond Mr of the Savoy, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Bond, John, 1612-1676.

titleStmt.title: Oriens ab occidente: or, A dawning in the vvest· As it was delivered in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons, at Westminster; upon their day of thanksgiving, for severall victories in the west, &c. By John Bond Mr of the Savoy, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Bond, John, 1612-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.D. for Fr. Eglesfield, and are to be sold at his shop, at the sign of the Mary-gold in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon of thanksgiving, for the taking of Bridgewater, and Sherborn-Castle, &c. in the west.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
